ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 29
ygData.msgSnippet: Doesn t work, they have made it impossible or EXTREMLY difficult to raise Indigo Faction.  Killing wood elves DOES not work.  The ones on Erollsi raise
ygData.messageBody:
Doesn't work, they have made it impossible or EXTREMLY difficult to raise
Indigo Faction. Killing wood elves DOES not work. The ones on Erollsi
raise Crushbone Orc Faction. I assume if you get this high enough the
brotherhood will tolerate you. But its SILLY. Its EXTREMELY easy to
become an outcast but nigh impossible to become evil.

The ONLY way I can think of are MAYBE the wood elf guards who are atleast
level 40 or more. The other way is to get the deceiver mask and do the
Indigo Quests a million times.

> ----------
> From: Paul Jesernig[SMTP:PWJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 4:44 PM
> To: INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 29
>
> From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
>
> I have killed high elf paladins in Innothule swamp (level 15-18) and I
> have
> never gotten an increase in faction with the Indigo Brotherhood. In Rathe
> Mountains north of the entrance from the ferroot, there is a wood elf (may
> be high but think wood) guard who is level 19-21. There are NPC's in the
> area who will call him when they see an ogre, but not sure if they will
> come if you attack him.
>
> Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
>
>
>
> Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >
> The ONLY way to raise Indigo brotherhood faction is to kill elves. The
> only
> realistic targets (since Wood Elf guards are very high level) are the
> elves
> on the Island of Erollsi. If you raise Indigo you lower Wood/High elf and
> vice a versa. These two sides are mutually exclusive.
> <
>
